meanings.definition: A level of a building above or below the ground
meanings.sent1: The top storey of the house had a beautiful view of the city.
meanings.sent2: The apartment building has ten storeys in total.
meanings.sent3: The storey below ground was used as a secret hideout by the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a storey with many rooms, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The storey of the haunted mansion was etched in the town's folklore.
